'''Herion''' ([[Third Age]] {{TA|2037|n}}<ref>{{PM|Elendil}}, p. 204</ref> – {{TA|2148|n}},<ref>{{App|South}}</ref> aged 111 years) was the third [[Ruling Steward]] of [[Gondor]].

==History==
He ruled for thirty-two years during the time known as the [[Watchful Peace]],<ref>{{App|TA}}</ref> and was succeeded by his son [[Belegorn]].

==Etymology==
''Herion'' is a [[Sindarin]] name. Its meaning is not glossed, but Paul Strack and David Salo suggest it is a compound of ''[[hîr]]'' ("lord") and ''-ion'' ("son").<ref>{{webcite|author=Paul Strack|articleurl=https://www.eldamo.org/content/words/word-701509255.html|articlename=S. ''Herion'' m.|website=Eldamo|accessed=05 February 2022}}</ref>
